uniol.apt.io.renderer

Class AbstractRenderers<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.io.renderer.AbstractRenderers<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class which the renderers should render.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderers<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LTSRenderers, PNRenderers

    public class AbstractRenderers<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderers<T>
    Class which provides the correct renderer for a given format.

    vsp
